New_York.San Lorenzo Ruiz Chapel (New York City): The Chapel of San Lorenzo Ruiz is a Roman Catholic chapel in the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of New York, located at 378 Broome Street between Mulberry and Mott Streets in the Nolita neighborhood of Manhattan, New York City. The chapel was established in 2005. The building was originally constructed for the Church of the Most Holy Crucifix in 1925-26, and was designed by Robert J. Reiley.
